overview: Vince invited his friend in his luxurious Alpine chalet to spend wonderful vacations skiing and partying. Yet, when they arrive, he run into a couple of lovers from Marseilles fucking in his own living room. It turns out that the real estate agency rent the place to those very charming people at the same time. Strangers have to share the house, but their collective kinky habits might eventually break the ice.
title: Ski, Sex & Fun
